reviews.review_text: Ive been coming to this gym for a while as a guest, and I finally ended up subscribing. They have affordable packages befitting for your goals and plenty of clean and working equipment. However, keep in mind that it is usually crowded at peak times. Staff is friendly and willing to help you, Eve (personal trainers) helped me to identify exercise posture and muscle to be trained on. She was really sweet. Overall, I find this gym functional for workout beginners and experienced people. You can monitor your progress with a personal trainer or with the equipment available.

Have been a member for >2 years, and still love it. I joined at some point in Covid and I was pretty grumpy... and this gym has helped me lose >30 pounds and make some big fitness gains. The manager (Dylan) is fantastic and relentlessly positive, and the staff is generally great. I recently experimented with some personal training with Mike and cant recommend him enough - he is super knowledgeable, patient, supportive, and knows how to push people really effectively. When I can afford training regularly, Ill try to get Mike - just a couple of professional moves away for me:) But my workouts with him were outstanding - highly highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Leanne, Youre the best. Thank you for the amazing comments. Dylan Campanaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: I have been doing personal training with Sarah H. for the past month and absolutely loving the sessions! She is so thoughtful and always encourages me to push myself so I can grow. I am excited to continue working with her! I also really appreciate how approachable and welcoming all the staff are. Members are usually pretty good about working in when it s busy too. In general, I feel a lot safer in this gym than others I have been to (yay for being a woman  ) because coaches are always around training someone and keeping an eye on things.

Love this place! My Personal Trainer Julie Tran has given me all the tools and resources to target my goals and feel amazing. She has been super supportive and has made me fall in love with fitness! 100% recommend training with her!!!

This is a great gym! A wide range of equipment, lots of different spaces to work out in and everyone is really friendly. They ve got great massage chairs too. I ve been doing personal training with Jason and would highly recommend.

I have had such a wonderful experience working out at Fitness World Cambie location over the past couple years. It is an affordable gym with a decent variety of equipment. What makes this gym truly stand out are the employees. They put a smile on my face whenever I come to the gym and that is saying a lot since I usually arrive at 6am slightly sleepy and grumpy. Id like to give a big shout out to Benny. He is one of the friendliest people Ive ever met. He is very diligent, remembers everyones names and it is clear he is passionate about his job and the members of Fitness World. Although there are larger gyms in the area, the sense of community Fitness World creates in their gym is unbeatable. Thanks for making all of my workouts such a pleasant experience.

Great, affordable gym to be working out at. The staff are honestly the friendliest Ive met - especially Bennie! What a guy. I would also recommend getting a PT session from Alex. He was a fountain of knowledge, fixed issues that other PTs in previous gyms have completely missed, really pushed me as hard as I could and was super motivating the whole session. I am training for an Ironman and he was on it with the sports performance side. If I ever had any questions he was always available to message also. As cringe as it sounds, I honestly feel so much more confident and happier following only a couple of weeks working with Alex. He also helped with a nutrition plan (which has always been my weak point!). Thanks again Team! Mark

Currently been going to this gym for the past couple of months, at first was bit iffy but turned out to be great since I joined with a personal Trainer there! At first was going for once a week which was fine budget wise but after awhile turned it to two times a week and am seeing better results, like how he teaches the exercises and isn t all that harsh when it comes to pushing through and finishing the reps, going fantastic and always do look forward to the PT sessions with Mike :D

The best gym I have even been to! The team has an incredible energy. From start with Adam signing me up to working out with the best personal trainer I have ever had the chance to workout that is James. The cleanliness and energy that the staff provides that keeps me motivated to come back everyday. Thank you guys for existing and supporting me on this limited time I am spending in BC.

I signed up at Fitness World this past winter and didn t realize how much it would change my life. Feeling nervous of machines and unsure what to do I signed up for personal training. I ve been training with Sarah which has made my experience so fulfilling. She feels like my superhero sidekick. I m fully supported, helps me stay committed, educates me on the body, and has been the perfect role model to embody feminine power. My physical body keeps gaining muscle as we work on my goals. Highly recommend Fitness World and Sarah. I m able to conquer life s obstacles with my new layer of inner and outer strength.

Great gym, always have a good time when I come here. I usually just come with my friend and I get free access. Which is one of the main reasons I love it. Very clean, pleasant staff and lots of different machines and weights to use.

Jason is a fantastic trainer and really works to make your goals his goal. Bennys positive attitude is contagious. Both are a fantastic addition to the team at Cambie. The gym itself is huge and has a great amount of machines and gear, you will never be waiting for a piece of equipment.

A Hidden Gem for Fitness Enthusiasts! Ive been a member of the fitness club managed by Dylan and his exceptional team for a short while now, and I must say, its an absolute game-changer. From the moment you walk in, youre greeted with a vibe thats both invigorating and welcoming   a combination thats hard to find. Dylans commitment to running the gym is truly inspiring. Its evident that he pours his heart and soul into making this place top-notch. The club boasts some of the most cutting-edge equipment Ive ever come across, and its not just about the quantity; its about the quality that truly sets them apart. You can feel the dedication in every rep you do. Speaking of equipment, the range is mind-blowing. Whether youre a seasoned athlete or just starting your fitness journey, theres something for everyone. And lets not forget those hidden pockets of stunning street views   a visual treat that adds a refreshing touch to your workout. One thing that truly seals the deal for me is the convenience. With free parking, you dont have to stress about finding a spot before you break a sweat. And those massage equipment perks? Theyre a game-changer after an intense session   a little slice of heaven to reward yourself with. If youre still on the fence, I highly recommend giving their free trial a shot. Its the perfect opportunity to experience firsthand what sets this club apart. Trust me, you wont regret it. Dylan and his team have created a haven for fitness enthusiasts thats as cool and casual as it is intelligent and forward-thinking. This is one review Im more than delighted to write, and I know youll be just as thrilled to join this fantastic fitness community. See you at the club!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi There, I wanted to personally respond to this review and express an immense amount of gratitude towards not only the time you spent to write this review, but the kind words expressed as well. Your feelings towards our club is the exact reason why I love being in this industry and I am so thankful that we have provided a positive impact towards you. If we can ever do anything for you, please let me know as we are always here to help. Dylan Campanaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: My trainer G is awesome!! Helped me lose weight and gain muscle. He pushes me beyond what I thought was my limit but shows I have more inside me. HIGHLY recommend him!!

I have been having personal training sessions with G for a few months now and hes fantastic. When I originally joined the gym I hated it and had no idea what I was doing, but G invited me to a free session and I ended up signing up for sessions with him. G has helped me so much with correct technique, strength and how to put fun workouts together and I now love coming to the gym! If you want a PT I would definitely go with G, hes great to work with!

I have been coming to this gym since just before Christmas and have had the pleasure of having G as a personal trainer. I took the free session with no intention of signing up for a personal trainer, but G blew me away and I felt like all my goals could be achieved with his guidance. I was not disappointed. I had a goal of weight loss for my wedding, but also to gain strength and mobility for my own longevity and quality of life, as I have a physically demanding job. G has kept me focused and on track and I have been amazed with the results I have seen. Overall, not only have I lost weight and feel much more confident in myself, I also had no idea I could get so fit, lift so much weight, and feel so strong! G is a demanding trainer, our sessions together leave me feeling pushed to the limit and amazed at what I have achieved. If you are looking to take it easy look elsewhere. G will push you and you will see results and have a blast at the same time.  He is exceptionally enthusiastic and passionate about his work and it is infectious. He is always available for advice and guidance. I cannot recommend him highly enough and will never have another trainer, I will always train the G way! I thank him for him encouragement and belief in me.
Good facilities and friendly staff. Due to the large scale of gym, there are fewer restrictions on the use of equipment even if many people exercise at the same time.

Michael Almeida is my personal trainer and he s been nothing but amazing!  He truly cares about your goal and helps you attain it by challenging you in a way that you never thought you d be able to do.  He mixes things up so you don t get bored.  He just seems to know when to push you to the next level.  He is very attentive, friendly and supportive.  My son and I enjoy training with him.  It has only been 2 and half months and we are already seeing great results.  If you re looking to improve your fitness level, go see Mike.  I highly recommended him.

Ive been with trainer Michael Almeida for over a month and Ive had nothing but a fantastic time so far. Ive been getting numerous comments on how I look slimmer and more muscular from my friends. Hes extremely personable and fun to talk to as well, and pushes me further than I thought I was capable of. I am becoming a stronger person mentally and physically. For those of you debating regarding starting personal training as I once was - I would highly recommend it. Training with a professional showed me just how much I thought I knew but didnt actually know.

Very nice gym, at least for me as a beginner. The staff is very friendly and always gonna be there for you if you need help. Also, the gym has hydro massage lounge that is incredible good after a long workout. Don t come here after 6pm because is too busy. If you need personal trainer, you definitely should go with G, the French guy. I ve been working with him once a week and I can tell he really cares about you and your process. After a month with him, I notice important  changes in my body. Thanks you G!

Trust the reviews! Dylan, the manager, is an awesome guy   super friendly, answered all my questions and I even saw him emptying the garbage cans in the weight rooms   he clearly cares. I also find the other gym-goers respectful and kind; as a woman who doesn t always enjoy being looked at when working out, I feel comfortable here. It can be quite busy at peak times, and I prefer to workout on the turf rooftop when it s nice out. There are currently low-intensity fitness classes with a sweet, helpful instructor. Everyone wears masks in every part of the gym. Happy I joined on the  Fit  membership and after checking out another location, this place will be my go-to. Looking forward to get stronger after being far-too sedentary during Covid!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hey Alison, First and foremost, thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review. Your positivity and attitude in the gym has made us extremely grateful to have you as a member. As always, whatever you need, please do not hesitate to reach out and we will be here to help! Dylan Campanaro General Manager

reviews.review_text: This is my fifth month in Cambie branch and overall I would say they have more machines and space compare to other branches. I workout with Michael for my personal training sessions and he is Awesome. Michael has a wealth of knowledge when it comes to fitness and nutrition, and he was always able to provide me with helpful tips and advice on how to optimize my workouts and diet. He was also very attentive to my individual needs and preferences, and he was always able to customize my workouts to fit my fitness level and goals. One thing that really stood out to me about Michael was his dedication to helping me achieve my goals. He was always there to motivate and encourage me, and he never hesitated to push me to work harder and strive for excellence. With his guidance and support, I was able to achieve things I never thought possible.

My experience at Fitness World Cambie has been truly outstanding, all thanks to the professionalism and dedication of the General Manager, Dylan, and his team members. Their commitment to member satisfaction shines through from the warm and professional welcome at reception to the personalized attention they offer. In the past, Ive experienced gyms where personal trainers appeared to lack expertise, and there was no higher authority to turn to for assistance. Fitness World Cambie, on the other hand, is a refreshing change. The trainers at this location are not just well-informed, but also incredibly supportive and enthusiastic, creating a comfortable and motivating environment for fitness enthusiasts (or newbies) across all levels. One of the standout features of this gym is the tight-knit family vibe and the sense of community they foster. Dylans approachability and his knack for remembering everyones names contribute to this welcoming atmosphere. This location exceeds expectations when it comes to essential factors a gym should have, offering a variety of classes, well-maintained equipment, excellent hygiene and ventilation, and spotless facilities. The diverse fitness options and genuine care demonstrated by the staff make this gym the ideal choice for anyone looking to improve their health and well-being. Whats more, if theres ever an issue, a quick word with Dylan usually resolves it without any fuss. In conclusion, I wholeheartedly recommend Fitness World Cambie for its unrivaled service, comprehensive facilities, and the exceptional approachability of the General Manager and team members, all while creating a warm, family-like atmosphere and a strong sense of community.

I have been training with G for 3 months now and it has been an amazing experience, Im finally motivated to go to the gym and feel confident using the equipment. Super friendly guy and has gone above and beyond to tailor my training plans for what I need. If youre looking for a trainer I would 100% recommend going with G!

Absolutely love this location! I have been going now for almost 3 months, and seeing Kat Tuason, for personal training. Shes 100% a big reason as to why I have enjoyed this location and going to the gym. Shes always on top of everything, and ready with all needed gear as soon as I arrive for my lesson. Which in this gym is very important, as it can get busy at times. However, that is to be expected with a great place. I find going to this gym actually pretty fun most days. And really enjoy the extra perks , like the Hydro massage chairs and pressure chairs. I also love how helpful and kind the rest of the stuff are. The General manager Dylan, is awesome too. Thank you all for the great work and keep it up !
